rooms.description: A spacious entrance area that respects Vastu by ensuring the main door faces east.
A large living space with raw concrete finishes typical of Brutalist design. Vastu recommends the center of the room for seating arrangements.
An elegant dining space that maintains the Brutalist aesthetic with industrial finishes. The layout adheres to Vastu guidelines by placing the table centrally.
A well-appointed guest bedroom with a private bathroom. The room is designed to ensure privacy and Vastu compliance.
A dedicated library space with built-in shelves, featuring a central reading area. Vastu principles are maintained by orienting the room towards the north for knowledge and creativity.
A modern gym with state-of-the-art equipment. The space is designed with Brutalist finishes and Vastu principles to encourage energy flow.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed with reinforced concrete and glass elements to blend Brutalism with modern luxury.
Large windows integrated throughout for natural light. They adhere to Vastu by ensuring proper placement and ventilation.
A balcony area overlooking the central courtyard. It provides a private outdoor space with Brutalist elements.

courtyard.description: A serene central courtyard designed to encourage natural light and air circulation. The layout follows Vastu guidelines for balanced energy flow.

rooms.description: The master suite includes an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Vastu principles ensure the bed is oriented correctly for tranquility.
A secondary bedroom designed with privacy and comfort in mind. Vastu influences are maintained for optimal energy flow.

openings.description: Upper floor windows ensure ample natural light and ventilation. Their placement respects Vastu guidelines.
